Results

Collection Builder Results

This page demonstrates search results as generated by mb. As of this writing, in mb search results, there is no sidebar with facets. 

<div class="row result">
    <h4>The wombat : common wombats in Australia / Barbara Triggs ; illustrated by Ross Goldingay.</h4>
    <div class="span1 select">
        <label><input type="checkbox" /><span class="offscreen">Select item 1</span></label>
    </div>
    <div class="span8 push-1">
        <div class="result-metadata-author">
            by
               Triggs, Barbara.
        </div>
        <div class="result-metadata-published">
            Published 1988
        </div>
        <div class="result-access-link">
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <a href="/Record/005655916" class="cataloglinkhref icomoon-info-circle">Catalog Record</a>
                </li>

                <li>
                    <a href="http://babel.hathitrust.org/cgi/pt?id=coo.31924052400748;q1=wombat" class="limited-access icomoon-locked">Limited (search-only)</a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="span3 in-collections">
        <h5>In your collection</h5>
        <ul>
            <li><a href="#">wombats and other marsupials</a></li>
            <li><a href="#">charismatic megafauna</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>
